summary: This bill, the Supporting Accurate Views of Emergency Services Act of 2025 (911 SAVES Act), aims to reclassify public safety telecommunicators (911 operators) within the Standard Occupational Classification System. It highlights the crucial role these telecommunicators play in emergency response, emphasizing their skills and the emotional toll of their work. The bill mandates the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to categorize these professionals as a protective service occupation, acknowledging their vital contributions.
